explains: n. 快乐；欢欣；重唱歌曲

sentences.en: She couldn't disguise her glee at their embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 看到他们难堪的样子她不禁喜形于色。

sentences.en: His victory was greeted with glee by his fellow American golfers.
sentences.cn: 他的胜利也使他的美国高尔夫球伴们为之高兴。

sentences.en: We already know that Justin Bieber and a song from Rent are on tap for Glee this season.
sentences.cn: 我们已经知道贾斯汀·比伯和《吉屋出租》的一首歌都会出现在这一季的《欢乐合唱团》中。
